action.name: Multiattack
entries: The githzerai makes three Psychic Warp attacks.

action.name: Psychic Warp
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) Psychic damage, and the target has the githzerai's choice of (A) the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the start of the githzerai's next turn or (B) the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition, provided the target is a Large or smaller creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

spellcasting.name: Psionic Defense
headerEntries: The githzerai casts {@spell Feather Fall|XPHB} or {@spell Shield|XPHB} in response to the spell's trigger, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
